title: Sex With The Genie
description: Working as an interior designer, Sara Owens spends her days hunting down home d√©cor items for her clients in the strangest of places, but when her newest clients request an Arabian themed design for their living room, Sara finds herself in over he head at an antique shop when she accidentally frees a genie from his lamp.The genie's name is Azazel, and not only does he want to provide Sara with her three wishes . . . he also wants some much needed release after a decade trapped inside his lamp, and Sara's just the woman for the job.At 4000 words, this erotic short story contains paranormal sex, romance, and a steamy encounter with one sexy blue genie!
author: Zara Slade
